creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: colorful images of monk praying and interacting with people, often with colorful nonhuman creatures looking on; some scenes inside and around shrine buildings; interspersed with large blocks of text
medium: Ink printed on paper with hand-applied color
title: Illustrations of the Life and Deeds of the Grand Master of Mount Kōya, vol. 6
